pages.text: The $(mob)Ant Ranger$() is monster that spawns undergrround in deserts in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is resistant to Fire and immune to Poison and Knockback. The $(mob)Ant Ranger$() is completely immobile. It attacks the player at range with a lobbed projectile. It may apply a $(thing)Poison$() effect on its target and will turn invisible when the player gets too close. Breaking the block underneath it eliminates it.
$(mob)Ant Salvagers$() drop $(item)Meat$() on death. These are a moderate source of food and have no other use.

$(mob)Ant Salvagers$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
